title: ICYMI - Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Why Is the Iowa Caucus First?
itunes:title: ICYMI - Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Why Is the Iowa Caucus First?
description:
Jordan Klepper examines Iowa's powerful role in presidential primaries and wonders why the caucuses don't kick off in a state with more diversity.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
